original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Incredible Shrinking Turtles
overview: Hey, Turtle fans--are you ready for a "fabuloso" feature-length adventure? Then try this on for size! Shredder'sâ„¢ shenanigans have shrunk the fearless green teens down to thimble-sized turtles. The only thing that hasn't been diminished is their appetite for pizza. Now, even a trickle from a storm pipe spells a tidal wave of trouble for these minimutants. Will our six-inch-high heroes grow out of this mess? Or might they end up as more morsels for some sewer shark? One thing's for sure--this is no tall tale!
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Incredible Shrinking Turtles
